Name: Red Head
Ingredients: 5 ml Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A bittersweet aperitif style cocktail with light strawberry and delicate lavender notes.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Miran Chauhan at The Bon Vivant, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Red Head contains 180 calories
